akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519

akn:content.akn:p:
§§ 2984, 2984a. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519
Section 2984, Pub. L. 88–452, title VII, § 731, as added Pub. L. 92–424, § 25(a), Sept. 19, 1972, 86 Stat. 701; amended Pub. L. 93–644, § 10(a), Jan. 4, 1975, 88 Stat. 2319; Pub. L. 94–341, § 2(b)(4), (5), 90 Stat. 805, 806; Pub. L. 95–568, §§ 14(h), 17(a)(37), Nov. 2, 1978, 92 Stat. 2438, 2443, set forth prerequisites, etc., for development loans for community economic development programs.
Section 2984a, Pub. L. 88–452, title VII, § 732, as added Pub. L. 92–424, § 25(a), Sept. 19, 1972, 86 Stat. 702; amended Pub. L. 93–644, § 10(a), Jan. 4, 1975, 88 Stat. 2320; Pub. L. 94–341, § 2(b)(6), July 6, 1976, 90 Stat. 806; Pub. L. 95–568, § 14(i), Nov. 2, 1978, 92 Stat. 2438, related to Model Community Economic Development Finance Corporation.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 1981, see section 9912(a) of this title, prior to the general amendment of chapter 106 (§ 9901 et seq.) of this title by Pub. L. 105–285.
